website_summaries.verdict: The ideal pick for users who want supreme support and comfort in this noodle's curved design.
pros: Inflatable noodle makes the product extremely easy to store, as well as portable
Older buyers appreciate the product's gentle exterior
Curved design works well for sitting
cons: A little shorter than the standard pool noodle
A few buyers claimed blue paint rubbed onto their skin after use

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT OVERBLOW IT
customer_reviews.text: this is my 3rd noodle. First one my husband put so much air in it that the plastic stretch so bad on one side, it is still usable but wider on one end. The other two are perfectly fine. No blue dye came off. They pack flat and use no space in my luggage. Very comfortable to lay on you back or float on your stomach. It's long, maybe 3/4 of a circle. Love it, would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its super! Perfect size and it doesn't flake like the ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually pick up a few new floats and noodles every season. So far this is the only one I've bought. Its super! Perfect size and it doesn't flake like the other noodles. And for the price, you can't beat it! I plan on ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Rose R

customer_reviews.title: Use if you want blue skin. Doesn't agree with spray sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: At first this seemed great. Perfect shape and no room in a suitcase. Ended up with blue splotches on my chest and back after a number of days of use. At first I was using rub sunscreen. When I switched to spray sunscreen or the 3-4 days of use so far had removed any coating over the coloring. And I started having blue spots on me. Family laughed as I got out of the pool. I was turning into a smurf.
customer_reviews.author: J4Real

customer_reviews.title: Died after its return date
customer_reviews.text: It is simply an inferior product - no longer holds air - we've had it six weeks and use it several times a week. Can't find a leak to patch - it is a DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Mil

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My sister had given me one when we were vacationing in Aruba. It’s perfect and so comfortable to float and relax in the water. It’s perfect to take wherever you go as you just deflate and pack it. When I got home I purchased several more for my pool!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, good price, outstanding service!
customer_reviews.text: Words just cannot express how much fun our eight (8) years old has with the Poolmaster Curved Noodle Ride-On. For bigger kids that started to swim, but are not very confident swimmers, this product is exactly what they need. In addition, I would like to thank for an outstanding service: first noodle came defected, we requested replacement and got a new one in less than 24 hours! It's fantastic. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelia

customer_reviews.title: This devise was great. It really does the job and more that ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this sitting floating device when we went to the fresh water spring in Florida. Since the waters are so deep you have to have a floating device to be in the water for a long period of time. This devise was great. It really does the job and more that one person can use it. We loved using it, definitely recommend getting for any floating situation.
customer_reviews.author: gigi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Noodle. Fabulous Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great Noodle. I bought because it was inflatable. I do a lot of entertaining in my backyard. I didn't want excess clutter. This is easy to blow up & also take the air out. It works great for floating on in the pool. It is very sturdy for doing water aerobics. The price point is fantastic. This would be great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Vee Nuna

customer_reviews.title: Leaked air immediately
customer_reviews.text: These would be amazing if they were more durable! The “Easter Bunny” got these for my kids and one deflated the first time we used it. Unfortunately it was after the return window so it was a total waste of money for us. 😔
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made. Vary pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It seems like it's made of nice not cheap material. Ordered for my son for going to the lake and held up nicely. He loves it held him great. Vary simple. I do think it will hold up nicely to a lot of use if taken care of. Vary pleased with the order might order another so we have a few for all the adults and kids for the price I can't see why not order more.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful. I just ordered more for gifts
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. I just ordered more for gifts.They roll up nice & small. I take them when I go on cruises,blow it up when I get to the beach & float in the water all day. Everyone is always asking where they can get it.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: These are great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for us to float on. They work and are fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Inflatable
customer_reviews.text: Quality inflatable, supports large male with no problems, would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gildein

customer_reviews.title: Best float i've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, i've bought every float - single tubes, double tubes, party floats for 8 people, regular noodles, recliners, etc but this $8 blow up noodle has been the best hahaha! You can sit and relax in the water on it in so many ways. I totally bought a second one so that if i want to sit on one and then also use one for my back or lay my arms/head on it that I can do that. It's fantastic. Also the one noodle holds me up just perfectly and i am a very plus sized woman. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: It's a pool floaty thingy. It does what it's supposed to do, namely, float. I wish it made me more attractive, but that's a tall order. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyTooMuchOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Float for everybody!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite float for everybody. If you want a great oversized quality pool noodle then this works perfect. It is everybody’s favorite float just to linger in the pool with.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Benfield

customer_reviews.title: Easy to float around
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable to swim forward or backward with this float.
customer_reviews.author: Lanag

customer_reviews.title: Durable floatie
customer_reviews.text: Great noodle for the pool. I wish it was a little bigger for adults. I’d say this is more geared toward teens. It’s held up well with my kids jumping and fighting over it.
customer_reviews.author: Jchristy

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these to use on our cruise. Loved them! Looking forward to taking them again. Easy to blow up, pack and deflate.
customer_reviews.author: LidoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Jealous much
customer_reviews.text: These worked out great. Bought them for a resort trip. Fit flat in the suitcase. Inflation was easy. Only thing is you cannot straddle them...they are too buoyant for that. Great purchase. Other guests were sooooo jealous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: The Picture makes this look BIG. It is not.
customer_reviews.text: No real complaints other than the picture makes this "ride on noodle" look far larger than it is. Maybe a child could ride on it? I still use it. I just hold onto it because come on: first world problems right?!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: fabulous for any pool or beach or Lake
customer_reviews.text: fabulous for any pool or beach or Lake. For young and old. Last summer I bought two Wahlmont vacation and left them with my two grandchildren. This summer I bought two more here at home for myself and a friend. These are amazing there better than any raft or any ring. The total you must have. Very affordable very durable and we love them
customer_reviews.author: M Cathleen

customer_reviews.title: They are plastic
customer_reviews.text: It's a blow up toy not an actual noodle. Inflatable plastic crap. If they hold air we'll give it a try , if not return. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will blow away.
customer_reviews.text: We live in Cedar Park, Tx. This is not something you can leave outside. It will blow away at any gust of wind. We've not even been able to use it so far.
customer_reviews.author: David Harris

customer_reviews.title: simple, but really good.
customer_reviews.text: It seems really plain, but this is one of my favorite pool floaties. It's better than the average "pool noodle" because it's already curved, so it's my go to, when I feel like floating around without going under water.
customer_reviews.author: healthy mama

customer_reviews.title: MUCH better than ever expected!
customer_reviews.text: Update 3 years later - we have used these on nearly every vacation and I still get asked about them! Buying for my mom for a trip in March! Bought 3 for a trip to Mexico. They worked great and roll easily. Last weekend, we brought them to a family resort and were seriously, the envy of the pool. I will buy again for the rest of our extended family. These noodles really are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sara T.

customer_reviews.title: Poolmaster Curved Noodle - Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few of these for friends for the beach and they work out great for floating in the ocean! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: FAV

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to foam noodles
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved them. I bought these as an alternative to foam noddles and they did the trick--although they are about half the length of the standard industrial waste noddles. Good for the lazy pool user who just wants to float away the afternoon. Must be inflated to use.
customer_reviews.author: MIG NYC

customer_reviews.title: Great pool float
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a swimmer but with this I spent hours in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hedges

customer_reviews.title: Love this little guy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy. Does seem to have a small leak issue. But works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Folkestad

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my workout routine in the pool. Sturdy enough to sit on and float also.
customer_reviews.author: christine ellery

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to pool noodles.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace pool noodles that were shedding bits in the pool
customer_reviews.author: Ron D.

customer_reviews.title: Better than a foam noodle
customer_reviews.text: I pumped it up weeks ago and I have not needed to top it off even once
customer_reviews.author: Tony Chelpaty

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed this pool curved noodle. I hesitated purchasing it because of some of the reviews complaining of the odor and the blue color coming off. Well...I'm so happy to say that was not our experience. I purchased it for a vacation to use in the pool. We couldn't be more happier or satisfied, not to mention the durability. They were enjoyed by all.
customer_reviews.author: Tina A

customer_reviews.title: Poolmaster Curved Noodle
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many pool noodles. I bought this on a whim. It works ok. My grandchildren use it some but mostly it's laying on the side of the pool. I thought it would be good to straddle it and sit on but it folds up. Good for a toy but not so much for a noodle. Doesn't take much to blow it up and it's easy to stick in your beach bag. Inflates and Deflates easily.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Great blow up float
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice for travel. Deflates and fits nicely in luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: kind of deflated while using it but i really like this thing
customer_reviews.author: piles.n.smiles

customer_reviews.title: Good float
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for us at the beach/ocean. Easy to blow up. Felt sturdy. Perfect for drifting. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cgk1866

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST NOODLE
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I have bought two and my best friend has also bought 2. You can be in the water yet still floating, lay or sit in multiple positions. easy to carry. NO PUMP NEEDED might be the best part. Also folds flat takes up no room. The price is amazing compared to a lot of other floats/noodles. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate works great!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves it! Blew it up himself :)
customer_reviews.author: Solange

customer_reviews.title: 5th summer
customer_reviews.text: I love these pool noodles! They are comfortable and hold up to near daily (ab)use from kids and adults from June-October. We buy new ones each season as they don't overwinter well, but that's on our poor storage system. They have not changed in 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Quandt

customer_reviews.title: Some have holes
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 I deflated and had to be thrown out
customer_reviews.author: kate Liegey

customer_reviews.title: Best Pool Float
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased these I had no idea I would enjoy them as much as I do. Fun to share or not share. Great accessory to our pool.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Leiker

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: We love these. Have purchased several over the years because we all fight over them. They hold up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Tara L. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Ordered wrong thing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and I never used it, in fact it’s still in the same box it was delivered in. I read noodle and automatically assumed it was a thick foam Pool noodle. Of course it’s been a while since I ordered this & I only wanted it to cut up the pool noodle for my baby’s car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they have been the best floaters ever
customer_reviews.text: I was totally surprised when I got these, they have been the best floaters ever, notj bad price either. I would for sure suggest these to anyone. Everyone loved them also. Wish I had 2 more!!! love them 1000%
customer_reviews.author: Tinker

customer_reviews.title: Nice floating device, as advertised, so far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Solid take on a traditional noodle... I purchased 3, but one was defective upon arrival... no problem, refund received a day later for the one... I use one under my shoulders and the other behind the knees... float all day.
customer_reviews.author: KJG

customer_reviews.title: not well made
customer_reviews.text: These were fun while they lasted. Guess what these aren't made for? Being out in the sunny pool! After a couple of weeks of use, the seams broke open and no it wasn't over filled.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent size and quality
customer_reviews.text: This pool noodle worked well for our recent trip to the lake. Everyone in our family (kids and adults) enjoyed using it. It doesn’t have the thin feel like many floats do. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great concept.
customer_reviews.text: These are great much better than a ring I purchased three because I like the concept, they are a hit in my pool I use it every day and so does hubby. It received his approval and that alone is saying something.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong, great value
customer_reviews.text: For such a low price, we didn’t expect this to be as strong as it is. Will be buying more!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie M

customer_reviews.title: Littler than looked
customer_reviews.text: Not near as big in person as it looked online, but it works for what we need it for
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: Wont stay inflated!
customer_reviews.text: From right out of the box this item would not stay inflated! Must have had a small leak somewhere. Defective item👎
customer_reviews.author: Denise Frontiera

customer_reviews.title: Great pool float!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to use in pool and can adjust how hard or soft you want it. Have gotten lots of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Float
customer_reviews.text: This is a great float, my wife and daughter as well as me (200 lbs) used it in the ocean and it worked great. Surprising how much weight it holds
customer_reviews.author: P. Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Love the shape
customer_reviews.text: Much more useful shape than a round float, more comfortable than a thin noodle.
customer_reviews.author: H. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this curved float.
customer_reviews.text: Great size. I toss it in our suitcase, inflate it at the resort and float. It’s not too big or long in a crowded pool
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a vacation so I could float, it works perfect. I’m 6’1 220lbs and it hold me up with ease. Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: ... I can say is 5 below store items are better.
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is 5 below store items are better.

customer_reviews.title: Great floatie!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in ocean while snorkeling on vacation in Cozumel. Worked great. Easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: missy hannem

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite pool float!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite thing to use in the pool. I love the curve, so happy I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Kayne

customer_reviews.title: Great to Lounge
customer_reviews.text: This is a great noodle. I'm 130lbs and it holds me up and I just float around.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it because I am the one that ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it because I am the one that has to blow it up when it loses air & it does very gradually at the seams. But for the price it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Teller

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought two one had a hole in it as soon as I opened the other one works but seems to be stretching the material out with use
customer_reviews.author: Preston R.

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the Pool
customer_reviews.text: Fun for floating in the pool and great price. It was used by adults.

customer_reviews.title: Good flotation
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a regular noodle and it was an inflatable. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: joe gray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Float
customer_reviews.text: I loved this in the pool as a float...in fact everyone did...good for all sizes from kids to adults to plus size!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: What a fun toy. Bigger and fatter than I expected and ...
customer_reviews.text: What a fun toy. Bigger and fatter than I expected and won't hold air for long but lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: marty lyman

customer_reviews.title: INFLATABLE TOY NOT NOODLE
customer_reviews.text: One very small mention in the description of this being an INFLATABLE!!!! It is NOT a 'noodle'...POC in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great float
customer_reviews.text: Loved this floatie. It was the perfect size to hang out in the water without sitting on an o-ring style float. Will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nga

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Helps keep hands out of water. I hate it when fingers feel like prunes.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: around your back like a lounger or in the front to hold onto ...
customer_reviews.text: This is ideal for relaxing or exercising in the pool. I live in FL all year round and the Styrofoam noodles get mildew but this noodle can be washed and maintained. You can use it in various poses...around your back like a lounger or in the front to hold onto as you exercise your legs. This is a great invention!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it, or I would is I could get ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, or I would is I could get my roommate off of it. She loves it too. Very nice to just float on.

customer_reviews.title: ... bunch of teens and pool toys- these held up nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Had a grad party with a bunch of teens and pool toys- these held up nicely.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and holds all sizes of adults. Will be purchasing more of them.

customer_reviews.title: Big and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Big, durable. Think of a beach ball in a semicircle shape. Inflatable and comes with a repair patch. Pretty large for a kid.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good for $6
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this product met my expectations. Seems like it is made of quality material. I think it will last a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap, was expecting a solid noodle not a blow up toy that doesn't hold air
customer_reviews.author: James M. Laurain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first one I bought another one super thick and doesn't loose air
customer_reviews.author: Debbielynne54

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to float away on my noodle.
customer_reviews.text: Got these noodles to pack in my suitcase for an upcoming cruise. Look forward to relaxing in the warm waters of the Caribbean with my noodle!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bonner

customer_reviews.title: Miskeading
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize you had to inflate... thought it was solid!

customer_reviews.title: Curved Noodle
customer_reviews.text: Had to purchase a replacement for the original that the dog ate!

customer_reviews.title: Love this pool float
customer_reviews.text: Love this pool float! Thicker than a normal noodle and more bouyant. Also easy to travel with and inflate when you get to your destination!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This curved pool noodle is awesome. Our family was fighting over who got to float with it all day.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome noodles!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome noodles! I wouldn't say it is better or worse than the full inflatable ring pool floats. It just depends on preference. I purchased two of these and two full ring's. I had multiple people ask me the name and where they could get them. Also, takes half the time to inflate these. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Craig V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Although it is light weight, it is a quality product. Ideal for luggage. Price is right.

customer_reviews.title: Intoxicating Rubber Smell
customer_reviews.text: Comes smelling so horrible it is intoxicating. I didn't use it...
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Wells

customer_reviews.title: Floating comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Floating in it daily Very comfortable and not restricting like circular tubes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Poolmaster Curved Noodle Ride-On
product_meta.description: Designed for hanging over and relaxing in the water, the Curved Noodle in its simple blue and white design visually pops off the water. Measuring approximately 3.5 inches wide from side to side, the 6 inches in diameter noodle provides the perfect buoyancy to submergibility ratio. Use your imagination for play and lounging in the swimming pool, on the lake, or at the beach.
feature_bullets: For all-day water enjoyment for all ages
Curved-noodle design allows you to comfortably hang over, sit on, straddle, or play with
Measures 44 inches wide and 6 inches in diameter (approximate deflated size)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars333 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
